attributes.review: I found this app to follow our President and his campaign. When I downloaded the app, everything seemed fine. Mr. Donald Trump!!! His app I tell you, I opened it and immediately, my phone timed out of the app. I tried clicking on it multiple times and then my phone crashed. My phone was off for about 4 hours and then finally rebooted. I have a horrible virus on my phone now. The audacity for Mr. Donald Trump to.... ask for my social security number and other very personal tax documents. That is an invasion of my privacy, my rights as a FREE AMERICAN CITIZEN. I don’t know what the hell the filthy app developers were thinking with this one. It was not it let me tell you😡. You may as well download a virus onto your phone and then burn it and throw it into a lake. DO NOT WASTE YOUR VALUABLE TIME. There are better methods okay people. Phones are the devil anyway and I don’t blame our POTUS Mr. Donald Trump. Of course I can never ever blame him for any of this country’s problems. This app is no exception. I say it’s these left wing antichrists causing all this destruction. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!

attributes.review:
This app was an enormous let down! 🤬 I have been waiting since 2016 for the 2020 election just so that I could vote for the annoying orange himself 🍊🙏🏻 but was forced to wait 69 👅💦 days just for the download to finish. I was finally able to open the app but as soon as I did my phone exploded 💥 and I was possessed by the anti-Christ...😈 I don’t remember what happened but my family told me that I had spent an entire week looking for friends of mine by the names of “Doonailed J Tramp” and “Alecs Joons” they also said that I wouldn’t stop repeating “Chinuh”🇯🇵 over and over. I went on a rampage and for the first time in my life started spewing racial slurs at Mexican citizens. 🤯 I later took my phone to the Apple store because of the explosion and they called me a libtard because my phone had the “Chinuh virus” and true conservatives cannot get the kung flu. I AM NOT RACIST I HAVE MEXICAN FRIENDS! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT MAKES YOU A RACIST AND YOU WILL BE POSSESSED BY THE ANTI-CHRIST HIMSELF! I AM A GOD-FEARING LITTLE CHRISTIAN BOY 👼🏻 AND THIS APP MADE ME LOSE ALL FAITH IN TRUMP AND HIS ENTIRE ADMINISTRATION 0/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND! 😭.
#雪花飘飘北风啸啸
attributes.title: CURSED APP!!!

attributes.review: I got this app to get updates on what’s happening in America. Once I downloaded it, my phone started glitching like crazy! I thought it was just my phone, but then one day I saw a note on my fridge that said “TRUMP2020.” I definitely did not put it their, my first thought is that someone broke in. The next day my fridge told me to go back to my COUNTRY! As a citizen born in the U.S. I was shocked and for sure knew someone broke in. I  rushed to my security camera and saw a bright orange Cheeto break in! I called the police, but they were to busy pepper spraying people to help me. I knew I had to take action into my own hands. I stayed up all night trying to catch this Cheeto, but then a gas started to fog up the room and I feel asleep! I woke up to my to my refrigerator gone and a note on my microwave “HELLO.” I looked on the security camera to see a women but her body was so stiff, like it was made out of plastic. Enough was enough and I deleted the app. The next morning my refrigerator was back in the house with my security camera destroyed.
attributes.title: CAUSED GLITCHES

attributes.review: So one day I went to the store with my dinosaur to get a fresh cow but when I got there they only sold horses. When I was at the store I remembered that I had to go feed my hostage. Usually I feed him an ounce of raw cow meat. I didn’t have any cow so I had to feed him my pet snake. When I gave him the snake he was like 👁👄👁. Then I went to get a Frappuccino from Starbucks on my pet iguana. But the Karen in front of me decided to throw a drink at me. I toldOn her. My mom didn’t seem to care so I decided to come to the app. But our Cheeto puff president didn’t want to tell this Karen not to throw drinks. So I decided to write this review. I also went in my kitchen to heat up some Ramen but my stove was gone and along with my white microwave and fridge and you know who did this this app. The app took all my stuff my house is now disintegrated and I don’t know what to say my hostage was just chained up to the floor. I decided to feed my hostage to my guano because my house was gone. That’s it the end. Black Lives Matter. Trump is racist. Dump trump. And that’s on PERIODTTT
attributes.title: No more Cheeto puff

attributes.review: first of all. i got this app to stay up to date and informed about all things political since the FAKE news is biased against the tangerine skin in office. 🧡 but one day when i was minding my business like a normal adult and this app punched me in the stomach causing my to miscarry my 2 second old fetus 😡🤬 then it choke slammed my gramma and spit in her face while continuously screeching “All lives Matter” and “Make America Great Again” once i recovered from the shock of my miscarriage i was able to get the app off of my gramma but when it did it pulled out her oxygen tube along then way and yeeted it in to the air. the oxygen tank landed on an open flame which caused a massive explosion and the entire block of houses caught fire. ☹️😥 needless time say this app is NOT free despite it saying that it is. this app has cost me and my gramma MILLIONS of dollars in hospital and medical bills. not to mention the fact that i lost my house and everything in it along with the entire neighborhood. THIS APP IS WORTH MILLIONS AND IT IS POTENTIALLY DEADLY. if i could give negative stars i would. ):
attributes.title: hurt and confused

attributes.review: I have downloaded this app because i am a BIG supporter of President Cheeto Man and i am..... TERRIFIED. Cheeto man haunts my nightmares every night. Im pretty sure the app hacked my brain and downloaded a virus 🦠 that puts the Cheeto man in my dreams. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!! THIS APP WILL HACK YOUR BRAIN. It also took away my will to live. This is a robbery! Let me talk to your manager! I want a full refund for my dreams without cheeto man in it. I want my dreams about becoming a legal citizen back! This is is INFURIATING 😡. ALSO be WARNED! This app will send COVID-19 directly through the phone screen. Anybody who has downloaded this please get a ✨✨covid-19 test✨✨. After the app gave me the coronavirus, my phone turned into a animatronic! It first changed my lock screen into a picture of a fat orange man. Then, it started to glitch and became to transform into its true form. The Cheeto Man Animatronic. It was terrifying. I cannot sleep at night because I have to watch through my security cameras to make sure it doesn’t move. For some reason it says “CHiiiiNA” when its walking. This is truly terrifying.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because I wanted to open my views on politics. But as soon as I downloaded my phone started to act weird , when I tried to call my mom , a picture of a Cheeto will show up. Then I turned off my phone to see if that will help but NOOO 
IT DIDNT !!! I honestly tried a lot of things like ... putting my cellphone on rice and EVEN deleting all of my apps but that didn’t help either it glitched and then my phone turned green I didn’t know what to do!! 
Then I called my grandma because I was having anxiety attacks because I was so sad and worried that this app wasn’t working and my grandma went to my house and made cookies and then I told her about the app and she just looked at me with surprise because she said she also downloaded the app and her neighbors wife that is related to my second but also third grandma died. 
It is sad that I had a good perspective about this app so it could open my mind but it didn’t work , now I my phone doesn’t work.
I’m writing this review on my electric toaster.
attributes.title: A joke! It didn’t work 😞

attributes.review: so when i first opened the app, i was greeted with a video of bertram doing the stanky leg.😏 THEN the app possessed👹my pet rat.🐀 i was going to feed it but he pulled out the GUILLOTINE on me🤬 my rat is usually so sweet so i blame no one but the trump administration (🤮) for this behavior. in response to my hamster trying to decapitate me, the app thought it would be funny to raise my dead grandpa from the DEAD.🧟‍♂️ little do they know, my grandpa is MICHAEL JACKSON.🕺🏼 yeah you heard me, the big MJ.🦾i was just chilling on my couch eating my dog’s toenails when suddenly, michael jackson just comes dancing in. at first i was all like “YUH MICHAEL GET INTO ITT”👁👅👁but next thing i know he’s chanting “trump 2020!🇺🇸”...so i killed him lol (i let my rat use the guillotine on him)🤪 ALSO, the app will steal all of your intestines right out of you!!! i was going to bury michael back into his grave when suddenly my intestines were ON THE FLOOR.😾now i’m being disowned because my parents say they don’t like girls who don’t have intestines 😭 i am very unsatisfied with the results this app gave me so DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP TOOK MY INTESTINES!!!

attributes.review: This app took 16 million years to download and once it did some weird giant Cheeto popped up and started yodeling “make America great again”. That attracted 12 pipers piping, 11 drummers drumming, 10 lords leaping, 9 ladies dancing, 8 maids milking, 7 swans swimming, 6 geese laying, fIvE gOlDeN rIiIiIiInNgGgGS, 4 calling birds, 3 French hens, 2 turtle doves and a partridge in a pear tree!!!! They sat outside my home for three hours! Then they kicked down my door and completely destroyed my home, breaking windows and my EXPENSIVE furniture. I ran out of my house right before it caught on fire!! My neighbors called the fire department and they put out the fire the 12 pipers piping, 11 drummers drumming, 10 lords leaping, 9 ladies dancing, 8 maids milking, 7 swans swimming, 6 geese laying, fIvE gOlDeN rIiIiIiInNgGgGS, 4 calling birds, 3 French hens, 2 turtle doves and a partridge in a pear tree were still there and attacked everyone in my neighborhood and killed them all!! I am writing this from the netherworld (like from beetlejuice). DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. Oh!, and the pop-up ads are annoying.
attributes.title: A terrible app, I would rate it zero stars if I could

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to see if i could find reasons to vote for our president again. yet there was NO reasons to do so but the app most likely has sold my phone number to telemarketing because i have been getting random phone calls/texts at night. 
why would that be necessary? it’s not. but the fact that trump has been extremely racist, also he’s a rapist, and also a mysogynist even tho he says he loves women. yet he’s constantly telling female reporters that they aren’t as important as the male reporters. he has said that women who get raped were “asking for it” no they were not. if men could CONTROL themselves this wouldn’t be a problem. also trump lied and said he supported the lgbtq+ community yet he hates them! he made a straight flag which completely ruins the purpose of pride! he has made it illegal for transgender and same-sex couples to have healthcare. he’s is trying to make it illegal for same-sex couples to adopt! all he is doing is ruining our future. if you support him then what is wrong with you.
attributes.title: disappointed
